In summary: Unprofessional, uncaring, unplanned, extremely late. Constella bygg was in charge of building 4 etage apartments in our bostadforeningen in S√∂dermalm. One of them was mine. They won as their price was lower than the competition. During the whole project attention to detail was almost nonexistent, and they would most often chose the cheapest option, and try to do as little as possible. Lots of mistakes on the way - with need to re-do things several times. At least 2 of the people in the apartments they were following ¬¥burned out¬¥ (brinna ut) due to the stress that their delays, lack of communication, and need for micro-management caused. When I confronted the person about the burn outs, his answer was that it was normal and it ¬¥happens all the time¬¥. During the project nearly everyone that was trying to reach them either got no answer, or got answers weeks late. As we were living in one of the apartments where they were working we asked if they could please let us know if advance when they would come. The answer was that they could not know, even a couple of hours in advance, if they would come. It was ¬¥impossible to plan¬¥ apparently. So they would just enter, without even knocking, at any time of the day (and sometimes night). This lasted for months, several days they would not show up, then come a random day, and so on. Once, one worker entered in the apartment at 1am while we were sleeping. I have no idea if it was for work, or to get a few hours sleep thinking we were not there. They were months late to finish the work they were assigned, with a lot of tings to fix left over. Now the project is over one year old, and as I write the heating they fixed is not working in any of the apartments. We have contacted them weeks ago for fixing it, with no answer, so most probably we will have to get another company to fix it. They may be ok for small projects, but avoid this company for any large work. Go for the more expensive options. It will be worth every sek.

AVOID AT ALL COSTS!! I never usually leave reviews, but I had to because of this horrible experience.  Yesterday my wife and I used this company to assist with our apartment swap with a woman that lives down the street. She also used this company for the swap.  The workers themselves were very professional and we had absolutely no issues with them. It was management that was the biggest let down.  We purchased a 2 hr minimum package which seems like a good deal at the start, but believe me it isn't.  In the lead up to the swap, we called several times and spoke to Mikael who seemed all over the place, forgetting that we were even booked with flyttfixarna.  An employee of the company came to our home to inspect for the cleaning and told us it would take 1 hour to empty.  We know that it would take us a lot longer than that to empty it, but since she said so, we assumed they had their way of doing it.  So with this information we would assume the whole move would take 2, maximum 3 hours. This was a big reason we decided to go with this company rather than the fixed priced alternative companies.  On the day we took a walk with our 2 month old baby because naturally we assumed what we had been told to be true, and we planned to come back after an hour and direct where boxes should go etc...  So we came back and not only were they not finished, but they told us it would take 5 hours! 5 hours! We went to the other apartment, and they told us 3. The other apartment was larger, we couldn't see the logic in this.  It's not the fact that it took a long time that upset us, it is that we were told false information. We ended up paying double what we had planned.  To make matters worse, after the move I requested to speak to Mikael again to discuss this, so they put me on with their boss Sam. In this phone call he yelled at me and patronised me saying "DO YOU KNOW WHO I AM?" etc.... and threatened to report me to the Swedish Authorities.  I tried explaining that the reason we were upset was because of the information we had been told, but i couldn't get a word in because he kept yelling at me.  After this phone call, I payed for the move. Very hurt and belittled by an aggressive man on the phone. After I payed,  he called my wife and threatened her. NEVER USE THESE GUYS.

Our server placed the cheese plate on our table and rushed away, promising to return to explain what cheeses were on the plate. I am pregnant, so we were concerned about whether the cheeses were pasteurized. After 10 minutes, our server had not returned and was busy serving drinks to other guests, seemingly oblivious to our multiple verbal and physical attempts to get his attention. We ended up hailing a server from a different part of the restaurant and he was able to help us.  At this point, it was 20:10 and we were still waiting on dessert. We had planned to go to the theater after our dinner and it was looking like there was no way we would be able to make it in time, so we hailed another waiter (ours still hadn't returned to us) and explained that we needed to leave soon and would appreciate our check along with dessert. He was courteous and returned shortly afterward with our check and a to-go bag with a couple of truffles.  He must have passed along our request to our original waiter who finally came to our table again with a card reader to take our payment. He didn't really ask anything about our dining experience and wasn't very concerned when we mentioned we needed to leave soon and would like our dessert.  The time had come where we needed to arrange for a taxi to make it to the theater in time, and still no sign of dessert, but we got up anyway to collect our coats and leave. As we were putting on our coats, the waiter who had kindly helped us when our original waiter was ignoring us was running out with our desserts, and although we thanked him for his help, we couldn't stay to enjoy them.  All in all, we started the dinner with a nice experience and ended it with a very poor and stressed experience. For a 2.5 hour dinner booking, surely it is not customary for a patron to wait for an entire hour after the main course to receive the dessert? The only reason we could see for our waiter to ignore us but remain attentive to his other tables was the fact that we weren't ordering much alcohol (considering I'm pregnant). Surely we still deserve good service even though we aren't racking up an expensive drinks bill? Surely the waiter is expected to check in with us every 15-20 minutes to make sure we are ok, or at the very least notice if we are waving our hands at him from afar? If we had sat and waited to complete our meal at our waiter's pace, we would not have received our dessert and finished our meal until well last 20:30, probably not until 21:00. Dining for 2.5 hours with good service can be a lively experience, but being held hostage and being ignored for that long was extremely unpleasant and was not what we had looked forward to, especially considering this was our last date night before we have our baby and therefore a special occasion.  I don't enjoy leaving negative reviews, but we really do normally enjoy Djurg√•rdsbrunn so I hope this review is helpful. We don't know if we will return after this experience but maybe our review will make another patron's experience better.  Thank you for your time, Lana Ankarcrona Lana.marie@live.com 072-311 19 41

I really regret to have Viktor Ekman as the broker selling my apartment in Sollentuna.
